actions.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 206 (Roll no. 260).

description: Amendment transfers $11.7 million from the Naval Petroleum Reserve into the Low-Income Weatherization Assistance Program.
purpose: An amendment numbered 28 as printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the low income weatherization program by $11.8 million which would restore it to the FY 1996 level. The proposed increase is offset from an equal cut in the naval petroleum and oil shale reserve account.
